articles.title: Neoadjuvant atezolizumab plus chemotherapy in gastric and gastroesophageal junction adenocarcinoma: the phase 2 PANDA trial - Nature.com
articles.description: A neoadjuvant treatment regimen of anti-PD-L1 monotherapy followed by anti-PD-L1 plus chemotherapy was well tolerated and led to a major pathologic response rate of 70% in patients with resectable gastric or gastroesophageal junction adenocarcinoma.
